common.tipPassWordRule: The password must be comprised of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters

login.msgLogin: Log in via SMS verification code
login.tipPwdRule: The password must be comprised of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters

reg.tipCountry: The country/region you choose will affect the applicable exchange rate and tax rate, which cannot be changed after registration
reg.goLogin: Already have an account? Log in
reg.privacyPolicy: BlueLink ICP Privacy Policy (In other language)
reg.protocol: I agree to the BlueLink ICP User Registration Agreement and the BlueLink ICP Privacy Policy (In other language)

bi.question: FAQ
bi.tipAuth: For our customers only. Perform real-name authentication first
bi.tipDept: You need to register as department. It is recommended to get the supplier's departmental invitation code first. Then, your supplier will transfer the O&M permission of the POS you purchased to you.
bi.tipInvitCode: It is recommended to get the departmental invitation code of your enterprise first, and join the department of your enterprise for joint O&M of the POS.
bi.tipMaintenance: You can update the app list and AD slot of the POS appstore, or set boot animation, logo, and wallpaper of the POS. For setting requirements such as printing density, screen app, system language, etc., you can configure in Parameters.
bi.tipTask: You can create tasks, select the content to be posted to your designated POS.
bi.questionOne: I want someone else in the company to operate and maintain my device together. What should I do?
bi.questionTwo: How can I give subordinate distributor customers the platform accounts and devices?
bi.questionThree: After an app is debugged, how can it be released to each machine sold in batches?
bi.questionFour: What should I do if the device is found to be wrong transferred?

certAudit.tipRegDept: Corporates that directly purchase from Tianyu are registered as level-one department and can manage multi-level sub-departments.
certAudit.tipJoinDept: If you are an employee, enter the invitational code of your enterprise to become a member of the department and jointly manage the device.
certAudit.tipChildDept: Other corporates to be registered as sub-departments shall get the supplier's departmental invitation code first.
certAudit.tipManage: You can monitor the running status of the devices in real time, control and manage the devices remotely. Support multi-level department and intelligent O&M to reduce labor costs.
certAudit.tipReferrer: Please fill in the name of the referrer of Wuhan Tianyu
certAudit.tipWaitAudit: Your application has been submitted and can be used after approval.
certAudit.tipForbidden: Your departmental permission has been disabled. Please contact your superior supplier to re-enable the permission!
certAudit.noPassReason: Your submission fails to be approved due to
certAudit.pendingTip: Querying user authentication information and department information, please wait...
certAudit.auditReceive: Dear user! The real-name authentication information you submitted have been received, and the audit is expected to be completed within 1 working day. After the audit is completed, you can apply for enabling device, connection management and other services! You can view the certification audit progress in Account Center.
certAudit.auditPass: Dear user! The real-name authentication information you submitted has been approved.
certAudit.auditFail: Dear user! The real-name authentication information you submitted has been rejected. Reason for rejection:
certAudit.auditTimeout: Dear user! The real-name authentication information you submitted has expired, please re-authenticate.
certAudit.tipRefuseReason: Please enter the reason for rejection
certAudit.tipIDTimeout: The validity period of the certificate has expired
certAudit.tipIDPhotoDefinition: ID photo is not clear enough
certAudit.tipIDPhotoInfo: The information filled in does not match the certificate, please check!
certAudit.tipProtocol: I hereby confirm that the above information (including the information provided when registering on this platform) is complete, authentic and accurate, and I will promptly provide Wuhan Tianyu Information Industry Co., Ltd. with written notice of any updates, and I agree that such information can be collected, used, stored and disclosed for risk control and compliance with applicable laws. I understand and agree to the transmission of such information to Wuhan Tianyu Information Industry Co., Ltd. in China.
certAudit.tipMessage: The real-name authentication materials you submitted have been received, and the audit is expected to be completed within 1 working day. After the audit is completed, you can apply to activate TMS, traffic management and other business systems! You can view the authentication audit progress in Account Center.

notice.title: Title
notice.tipSelectGroup: Please select an department group first

message.tipDelAll: Are you sure to delete all messages?
message.tipReadAll: Are you sure to mark all messages as read?

task.tipSelTask: Select at least one task content
task.name: Name
task.tipPresetTask: The preset task is the initial installation process of bare POS device. After setting, the user can follow the boot wizard to complete the initial installation of the POS.
task.tipAppConfig: Please keep at least one configuration
task.tipContent: Please select the task content (multiple choices)
task.tipPublishScope: Publish part, distribute according to the set of all configured devices
task.tipScopeSelect: Select at least one of the publishing scope
task.tipSNSelect: Please select at least one SN
task.detailAppTip: The application list is updated frequently, and the execution of the "Store release" task is not counted.
task.detailAdTip: The AD slot is updated frequently, and the task execution status is not counted.
task.detailPatchTip: The patch task has not returned yet, and the task execution status is not counted.
task.tipForAppStore: 1. Publish on Appstore: After publishing, it will appear on Appstore.
task.tipForAppSlientInstall: 2. Silent Installation: The app can be installed on devices without user consent.
task.tipForAppForceInstall: 3. Forcible Installation: The user is reminded repeatedly. After the user agrees, the app is installed on the device.
task.tipForAppSlientUninstall: 4. Silent Uninstallation: The app can be uninstalled without user consent.
task.tipForAppForceUninstall: 5. Forcible Uninstallation: The user is reminded repeatedly. After the user agrees, the app is uninstalled.

password.tipPwdLength: The password length shall be 8-16 characters
password.tipPwdRule: The password length is limited to 8-16 characters, including at least one letter, one number, one special character, which cannot be continuous

account.tipUpdateNum: You can modify it three times a month
account.suggUpdate: Change your password regularly to keep your account safe
account.suggBindEmail: It is recommended to bind email address immediately to increase security protection
account.suggBindMobile: It is recommended to bind mobile number immediately to increase security protection
account.tipCancelInfo: If you no longer use this account, you can cancel it
account.name: Real name
account.tipCancel: After cancelling the account, you will no longer be able to log in with this account. Are you sure to cancel it?

gateway.name: Gateway name

gateway.hasLeastOne: Please keep at least one configuration
gateway.tipsForTopics: Subscribe Topic from MQTT service, separated by ',' and represent wildcards with '+'
gateway.productAlias: Product alias (please select message protocol first)

assembly.name: component name
assembly.note1: Android OS patch. You need to go to Task Center to publish tasks after creating a patch, select preset tasks and routine O&M tasks according to the task type. Add a publishing task
assembly.note2: Responsible for updating the promotion and advertising slots of the POS Appstore. You need to go to Task Center to publish tasks after creating an advertising slot, select preset tasks and routine O&M tasks according to the task type.
assembly.maxMessageSize: The maximum length of the received message (byte)
assembly.tipsForMicro: Network component microservice name, which is used by the CTWing module or the Lwm2m service to request the platform
assembly.tipsForPath: The CTWing module or Lwm2m service requests resource paths from the platform
assembly.tipsForBaseURL: The platform sends the command URL prefix to the CTWing module or the Lwm2m service

product.tipsForUpload: 1. Please upload jpg, png, jpeg, gif files 2. The recommended size is 160*160px! The maximum supported file size is 5MB

device.confirmclearApp: Are you sure to clear app data?
device.rulesForSn: Fill in the SN matching the SN prefix
device.tipsForSnRules: Taking 6902100100032530-6902100100082130 as an example, the prefix is 69021001000, the suffix is 30, and the middle 325-821 represents the serial number of the batch of device.
device.rulesForNumAlp: Device SN consists of numbers and letters
device.rulesForCompPreSuff: Enter the SN that matches the prefix and suffix

device.comfirmBindMerchant: Are you sure to bind with this merchant?
device.maxDeviceImport: Upload up to 1000 pieces of data at a time

device.confirmForOutGroup: Are you sure to quit the group

rule.title: Title
rule.hasLeastOnePersion: Please select at least one recipient
rule.hasNoEmail: A specified user does not have a mailbox
rule.tipsForTag: The common variables are wildcards. The alarm information is pushed based on the actual device.For example, if you configure "Dear user, "Product name" SN: "Device SN" alarm occurred", the actual alarmed device is P30, 6902100100031640. Then the user receives the email "Dear user, P30 SN: 6902100100031640 alarm occurred".

application.addApp: Are you sure to add the app?
application.removeApp: Are you sure to remove the app?
